summary: I needed a suitable shield for a Stomcloak, not finding any on Nexus, I tried to make my own texture. This Concept piece is only a low res 512x512 to keep it simple as I learn.
descriptionHtml:
[center]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57672/?tab=4&&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fcomments%2F%3Fmod_id%3D57672%26page%3D1%26sort%3DDESC%26pid%3D0%26thread_id%3D2063374&pUp=1]Google Translate[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3231858/]Thanks To Elianora For The Shine Help[/url]

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/sxBKDya.png[/IMG][/center]
author: en3raider

files.name: The Storm Shield
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed issue with normal map causing shine. Thanks Elianora for the advice.
Replaced missing tempering recipe (1 Steel)
